WITH PD_INF AS ( SELECT T1.PD_CD , T1.PD_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN , (SELECT MIN(PD3.BASE_PD_CD) FROM TB_PDBS_PD_REL PD3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PD_CD = PD3.OJ_PD_CD(+) AND PD3.PD_REL_TP_CD(+) = '05') SALE_CD FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /*상품기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD IN ('PART', 'PDCT', 'SPP') AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' WHERE 1=1 ) , INQRY_LIST AS ( SELECT (CASE WHEN V1.SVC_TP_CD ='3' AND V1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN V1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO ELSE V1.CNTR_NO END) AS CNTR_NO , (CASE WHEN V1.SVC_TP_CD ='3' AND V1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN IS NOT NULL THEN V1.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN ELSE V1.CNTR_SN END) AS CNTR_SN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', V1.SVC_TP_CD , 'ko') SELL_TP_CD /* 고객유형 SALE_TYPE */ , V1.IST_DT , T6.RCGVP_KNM FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.SELL_TP_CD , T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD , (CASE WHEN T1.SELL_TP_CD IN ('1', '2', '4') /*판매유형코드 : 1 일시불, 2 렌탈/리스, 3 멤버십, 4 회사설치, 5 유지관리, 6 정기배송, 9 필터*/ AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '401' /*계약상세상태코드 : 101 정상, 201 고객요청정지, 202 연체정지, 203 해약접수정지, 301 고객요청해약, 302 연체해약, 303 계약취소, 401 최종종료, 402 계약기간종료*/ AND T3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO IS NULL THEN '9' WHEN T3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '3' ELSE T1.SELL_TP_CD END) AS SVC_TP_CD /*서비스상태코드(AS-IS AC201_SALE_TP) - 현업이랑 협의하여 기준점을 잡아야 함*/ , T3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO /*멤버십계약번호*/ , T3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN /*멤버십계약일련번호*/ , NVL(T2.IST_DT, SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT,1,8)) AS IST_DT FROM WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 /*계약상세*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T2 /*계약WELLS상세 - 원래는 inner join 으로 해야 하는데 데이타 이행이 제대로 안되서*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL T3 /*계약관계*/ ON T3.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO /*멤버십이외원코드*/ AND T3.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '212' /*계약관계상세코드 : 108 무료체험교체, 211 필터 - 정수기, 212 멤버십 - 원주문, 213 정수기 - 부가서비스, 214 정기배송 - 원주문, 215 1+1연계, 216 모종결합, 217 소개추천, 218 에어컨결합, 219 홈케어, 221 홈케어멤버십, 22L 플래너상조제휴, 22M 다건, 22P 패키지(대수할인), 22W 패키지상품*/ AND T3.VL_END_DTM >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /*유효시작일시*/ AND T3.VL_STRT_DTM <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /*유효종료일시*/ AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_RSG_PROCS_IZ T4 /*계약해지처리내역*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.SELL_TP_CD IN ('2', '4','9') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.RSG_FSH_DT IS NULL /*설치일자 조회 조건이 있을 경우 */ /*AND NVL(T2.IST_DT, T1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT) BETWEEN '20100100' AND '20230600' */ ) V1 INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T5 /*계약주소관계*/ ON V1.CNTR_NO = T5.DTL_CNTR_NO AND V1.CNTR_SN = T5.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T5.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소, 3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T5.VL_STRT_DTM AND T5.VL_END_DTM AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T6 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON T5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T6.CNTR_ADRPC_ID /*계약주소지ID*/ AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 /*서비스유형코드 조회 조건이 있을 경우 */ /*AND SVC_TP_CD IN ('1', '2', '4') */ ) SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN /* 고객번호 */ , INQRY_LIST.RCGVP_KNM /* 고객명 */ , SELL_TP_CD AS SELL_TP_NM , SALE_CD /* 판매코드 */ , PD_INF.SAP_MAT_CD , PD_INF.PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , PD_INF.PD_NM /* 상품명 */ , S1.SS_PDCT_BC_NO /* 삼성 제조번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(S2.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 8)), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FST_RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , S2.OG_ID /* 등록지점 */ , P1.OG_NM , S2.PRTNR_NO /* 담당자 */ , P1.PRTNR_KNM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'BFSVC_WKP_DV_CD', S1.WK_PSIC_DV_CD, 'ko') WK_PSIC_DV_CD /* 담당자구분 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ S1 /* AC201 고객서비스수행내역 */ INNER JOIN PD_INF ON S1.PDCT_PD_CD = PD_INF.PD_CD INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY T.CNTR_NO, T.CNTR_SN ORDER BY T.VST_FSH_DT) AS RN , T.* FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T /* 고객서비스작업결과내역 VS106 */ WHERE SS_PDCT_BC_NO IS NOT NULL) WHERE RN = 1 ) S2 ON S1.CNTR_NO = S2.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S2.CNTR_SN AND S1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = S2.PRTNR_NO AND S1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS P1 ON S1.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO AND S1.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND S2.OG_ID = P1.OG_ID INNER JOIN INQRY_LIST ON S1.CNTR_NO = INQRY_LIST.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = INQRY_LIST.CNTR_SN AND S1.IST_DT = INQRY_LIST.IST_DT WHERE 1=1 /* 등록일자 잘못매핑됨 이해욱이사님께서 확인해주신다고 하셨습니다!20231016 */ /* AND S1.FST_RGST_DTM BETWEEN '20201104' ||'000000' AND '20201104'||'235959' */ AND S1.IST_DT BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} /* 20201104 임시 */
AND S1.CNTR_NO||'-'||S1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrDtlNo} /* 계약상세번호 검색 */
AND SALE_CD = #{saleCd} /* 판매코드 검색 */
AND INQRY_LIST.RCGVP_KNM LIKE '%'||#{rcgvpKnm}||'%' /* 고객명 검색 */
AND S1.SS_PDCT_BC_NO = #{ssPdctBcNo} /* 삼성번호 검색 */
